name: Spheroid
description: This is a little game that is a collection of missions that range from racing down a highway, exploring a cave, or eliminate squadrons of enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4510U Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 160 MB available space

reviews.review_text: THis ♥♥♥♥ is so bad its not even funny
Good game with a lot of potential, but you really need to be able to change keybindings.
why the ♥♥♥♥ do i own this game
